reviewText: The book is a joy to read to my students. We got many hours of classwork from it. I consider it a used classroom tool for first graders.

Simply the best Reading Rainbow episode EVER because it includes a behind the scenes look at Star Trek: The Next Generation!  It makes perfect sense since LaVar Burton is in both of these shows!  I remember watching it as a kid and was completely blown away!  I have MY copy, do you have yours?  Definately a MUST for Star Trek and Reading Rainbow fans alike!
